WorkItem.Description:
Consider main window that has Icon set to an *.ico file:

<mui:ModernWindow x:Class="Scheduler.MainWindow"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:mui="http://firstfloorsoftware.com/ModernUI"
        ContentSource="/view/StartPage.xaml"
        Icon="assets\Ship.ico"
   ...

This builds and works on Windows 8, but the program crashes on Windows XP. 
If you set the icon to a png file, the app works on XP too:
Icon="assets\Ship.png"
WorkItem.Summary: Icon file crashes app on Windows XP
